R

randomMove() - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.npc.ghost.Ghost
Determines a possible move in a random direction.
refresh() - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.ui.PlayerInfosPanel
Refreshes the scores and the lives of the players.
refreshLevelChoices(int) - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.ui.PacManUI
Removes all "level selection" radio buttons and adds those that are needed (up to @maxLevelReached).
register(Level) - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.level.Player
Registers the given Level to the player so that he can communicate with it when needed.
registerPlayer(IdentifiedPlayer) - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.level.Level
Registers a player on this level, assigning him to a starting position.
registerPlayer() - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.level.LevelTest
Verifies registering a player puts the player on the correct starting square.
registerPlayerTwice() - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.level.LevelTest
Verifies registering a player twice does not do anything.
registerSecondPlayer() - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.level.LevelTest
Verifies registering a second player puts that player on the correct starting square.
registerThirdPlayer() - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.level.LevelTest
Verifies registering a third player puts the player on the correct starting square.
remainingPellets() - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.level.Level
Counts the pellets remaining on the board.
reset() - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.game.Game
Forces subclasses to provide a method allowing to reset the score and the number of lives the player has.
reset() - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.game.SinglePlayerGame
Resets the score (to 0) and the number of player lives (to 3).
resetHoF() - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.game.HallOfFame
Resets the Hall of Fame to its default values.
resetScore() - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.level.Player
Resets the score (to 0).
resetTest() - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.game.SinglePlayerGameTest
Tests that the score and the number of lives a player has are effectively reset to default (when #Game.reset is called).
resourceMissing() - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.sprite.SpriteTest
Verifies that an IOException is thrown when the resource could not be loaded.
restart() - Method in class nl.tudelft.jpacman.sprite.AnimatedSprite
(Re)starts the current animation.
